Summary: Biochemical reaction from etoposide to etoposide catechol. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A4 or CYP3A5.
Biochemical reaction from etoposide quinone to glutathione conjugate. This interaction can be catalyzed by GSTP1 or GSTT1.
Biochemical reaction from etoposide catechol to etoposide quinone. This interaction is catalyzed by MPO.
Biochemical reaction from etoposide to etoposide glucuronide. This interaction is catalyzed by UGT1A1.
Biochemical reaction from etoposide to etoposide quinone. This interaction can be catalyzed by PTGS1 or PTGS2.
Transport from etoposide glucuronide to etoposide glucuronide. This interaction is catalyzed by ABCC3.
Transport from etoposide to etoposide. This interaction can be catalyzed by ABCB1 or ABCC3.
Transport from glutathione conjugate to glutathione conjugate. This interaction is catalyzed by ABCC1.
